title: GR - A Universal Framework for Visualization Applications
summary: For the creation of visualization programs there are a number of free and commercial tools and libraries. In a heterogeneous environment it points out that there is no universal solution that covers the specific needs in a scientific environment. GR is a framework for cross-platform visualization applications ranging from publication quality 2D graphs to the representation of complex 3D scenes.
